attributes.action: Change the legal age to get a tattoo from 18 too 16 with parental consent.
attributes.additional_details: Currently, the legal age to get a tattoo in the uk is 18. I believe that slowly, more and more freedom is being take away from teenagers, “young adults”, with everything that goes on in the world with identity, I also believe that decreasing the age in which you can get a tattoo, may help people express themselves even more.
attributes.background: Currently, the legal age to get a tattoo in the uk is 18. I believe that slowly, more and more freedom is being take away from teenagers, “young adults” I think the legal age in which you get a tattoo should be lowers too 16, with parental consent.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616975
